# Open Short URL

> A powerful, self-hosted URL shortener with advanced analytics, A/B testing, and AI integration.

Open Short URL is an open-source, white-label URL shortening platform that gives you complete control over your data. It features comprehensive analytics, link bundles, webhook notifications, and Model Context Protocol (MCP) integration for AI assistants.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/guide/introduction): Overview of the project and its features
- [Getting Started](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/guide/getting-started): Quick start guide for new users
- [Installation](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/guide/installation): Step-by-step installation instructions
- [Configuration](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/guide/configuration): Environment variables and settings
- [API Reference](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/api/reference): Complete REST API documentation

## Features

- [URL Shortening](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/url-shortening): Create and manage short URLs
- [Analytics](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/analytics): Click tracking, geographic data, device stats
- [A/B Testing](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/ab-testing): URL variants with traffic allocation
- [Bundles](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/bundles): Organize URLs into collections
- [Webhooks](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/webhooks): Event notifications with HMAC-SHA256 signing
- [API Keys](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/features/api-keys): Manage API access tokens

## Deployment

- [Docker](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/deployment/docker): Container-based deployment
- [Self-Hosted](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/en/deployment/self-hosted): Manual installation guide
- [One-Click Railway Deploy](https://railway.com/deploy/EATit9): Deploy instantly on Railway

## AI Integration

- [MCP Server](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@open-short-url/mcp): Model Context Protocol server for AI assistants
- Built-in AI Chat: Support for Claude, GPT, Gemini, Mistral, Cohere

## Optional

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/supra126/open-short-url): Source code and issue tracker
- [繁體中文文檔](https://supra126.github.io/open-short-url/zh-TW/): Traditional Chinese documentation
